page.title: 11SMALL HOLDINGS IN CLANFIELD
page.content: In April 1985 Mr and Mrs Bishop purchased the almost derelict Blagdon farmhouse,plus a plot of 1.8 hectares. Mr Bishop still maintains his full time employment in nearby Wickham, whilst Mrs Bishop runs the small holding.The property has been acquired in case of redundancy and is being modernised.As well as keeping hens,Mrs Bishop assists in looking after a small flock of sheep and two horses belonging to a relative.She has two children who attend school locally. She serves on the school committee and takes an active interest in the local cub and scout groups.Because of the inconvenience of a public footpath running through the property the E.H.C.C have been requested to re_route the path on the boundary. There has been no objection to stubble burning done under strict supervision.
